The claim that Kiran Bedi is the newly: appointed governor of Jammu and Kashmir was made by BJP MLA Bhanuben Babariya on June 4 and was also shared on the Facebook page 'Modi Mission 2024' on June 1.
Several other pages and groups on social: including 'I Am Proud Indian', 'भारतीय जनता पार्टी महा संघ', 'Yogi Adityanath Fan Club', 'Main Bhi Chowkidar', and 'Jai Ram Thakur (जयराम ठाकुर ) CM of Himachal with modi ji, Namo', also alleged the same claim.
A poster of BJP UP MLA Chandrapal Kushwa: 4. The official Twitter handle of Lt Gov Puducherry and Kiran Bedi's own Twitter profile mention that she has been serving as the lieutenant governor of Puducherry since May 2016, and not as the governor of Jammu and Kashmir.
